definition[0]: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal
example[0]: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
example[1]: She was told last year that she had cancer.
example[2]: He died of cancer last month.
example[3]: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
definition[1]: an evil influence that affects a lot of people and is difficult to stop
example[6]: Drug abuse is the cancer of our society.
definition[2]: the fourth sign of the zodiac, represented by a crab, which some people believe affects the character and life of people born between June 22 and July 23
definition[3]: someone who was born between June 22 and July 23
